repositories.description: a patch for AMM that changes how AMM loads the resources, making it asynchronous and thus the freezes you usually get when the game loads the new appearances. This is a patch to the original mod and still requires AMM to be installed.
repositories.name: AMM patch - asynchronous loading

repositories.description: An addon to the mod PhotoMode 2inOne for Debug Console Enabler to gain access to console commands with the same feature. To use alongside the photomode mod.
repositories.name: Photomode 2InOne - Console commands
